creator: Eilz2PSAEAA
name: Servicemesh - Last Contacted Leader Detector
programText:
A = data('gauge.consul.raft.leader.lastContact.avg').publish(label='A')
detect(when(A > threshold(200), lasting='5m')).publish('Servicemesh - Last Contacted Leader Detector')

rules.description: The value of gauge.consul.raft.leader.lastContact.avg is above 200 for 5m.
